statements: SELECT * FROM contact_details;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM contact_details WHERE phone_number='123456789';
SELECT contact_id, first_name, last_name FROM contact_details ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM contact_details WHERE first_name='John' AND last_name='Doe';
SELECT contact_id, email FROM contact_details WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM contact_details WHERE first_name = 'John'
SELECT contact_id, first_name, email FROM contact_details WHERE last_name = 'Doe'
SELECT contact_id, last_name, phone_number FROM contact_details WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT * FROM contact_details ORDER BY last_name DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM contact_details WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM contact_details;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM contact_details ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT contact_id, email FROM contact_details WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY contact_id DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, communication_type FROM communication_logs WHERE communication_type = 'Call';
SELECT contact_id, communication_content FROM communication_logs WHERE communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY contact_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM contact_details ORDER BY first_name DESC, last_name ASC
SELECT first_name, email FROM contact_details WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%'
SELECT contact_id, log_timestamp, communication_type FROM communication_logs WHERE communication_type = 'Call' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC
SELECT contact_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM contact_details WHERE first_name LIKE 'A%' AND last_name LIKE 'D%'
SELECT contact_id, first_name, last_name, communication_content FROM contact_details JOIN communication_logs ON contact_details.contact_id = communication_logs.contact_id ORDER BY first_name ASC
SELECT * FROM contact_details;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM contact_details WHERE contact_id = 1;
SELECT contact_phone, contact_name FROM contact_details ORDER BY contact_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT donor_id, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donor_stewardship ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM contact_details ORDER BY contact_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM contact_details WHERE contact_phone LIKE '%123%' AND contact_email IS NOT NULL;

SELECT c.contact_name, l.log_date, l.communication_details FROM contact_details c JOIN communication_logs l ON c.contact_id = l.contact_id WHERE l.communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY l.log_date DESC;
SELECT d.donor_id, d.donation_amount, ds.notes FROM donor_stewardship ds JOIN donor_stewardship d ON ds.donor_id = d.donor_id WHERE ds.donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM contacts;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM contacts WHERE contact_id = 1;
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone FROM contacts ORDER BY contact_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE log_type = 'Email' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id;
SELECT * FROM contacts WHERE contact_id = 1;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM contacts WHERE contact_id = 2;
SELECT log_date, log_type, log_description FROM communication_logs WHERE log_id > 100 ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id WHERE donation_amount > 1000;

SELECT contact_name, contact_email, donation_amount FROM contacts JOIN donors ON contacts.contact_id = donors.donor_id JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM contact_details;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM contact_details WHERE contact_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, total_donation FROM donors WHERE total_donation > 1000;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM contact_details;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email, total_donation FROM donors ORDER BY total_donation DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT communication_type, communication_details FROM communication_logs WHERE contact_id = '1234-5678-9012-3456';
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_method FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
